name: Faria, Chosen Girl
text:
This card gains "Faria, the Ruler of God Sword" in addition to its other names.
When this card enters your field, if you control "Call to Action's Memoria" destroy up to one target resonator. If you control four "Call to Action's Memoria", destroy all resonators your opponent control instead.
Whenever you gain life, put a [+100/+100] counter on each J/resonator you control.
